statements: SELECT * FROM food_nutrition;
SELECT food_name, calories FROM food_nutrition WHERE protein >= 10;
SELECT food_name, protein, fat FROM food_nutrition WHERE calories <= 300;
SELECT food_name, carbohydrates FROM food_nutrition WHERE calories >= 200 AND fat <= 5;
SELECT food_name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_nutrition WHERE food_id = 3;
SELECT food_id, food_name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_nutrition WHERE calories > 100 ORDER BY protein DESC
SELECT food_name, calories, protein FROM food_nutrition WHERE protein > 20 AND (carbohydrates < 30 OR fat < 10) ORDER BY protein ASC, calories DESC
SELECT * FROM food_nutrition WHERE protein > 15 AND carbohydrates < 50 AND fat < 10 ORDER BY food_name ASC
SELECT food_name, calories FROM food_nutrition WHERE calories BETWEEN 200 AND 300 ORDER BY calories DESC
SELECT food_name, calories, protein, carbohydrates FROM food_nutrition WHERE protein > 10 AND (carbohydrates < 40 OR fat < 15) ORDER BY carbohydrates ASC, food_name DESC
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT name, calories, protein FROM food_items;
SELECT id, name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items;
SELECT * FROM food_items ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT name, protein, fat FROM food_items WHERE carbohydrates < 10;
SELECT name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM food_items WHERE protein > 10 AND carbohydrates < 20;
SELECT name, calories FROM food_items ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT name, protein, fat FROM food_items WHERE calories BETWEEN 200 AND 400;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) FROM food_items JOIN food_categories ON food_items.id = food_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT item_name, calories, protein FROM food_items ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT item_name, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items WHERE protein > 20;
SELECT item_name, calories, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items WHERE calories < 200 AND carbohydrates < 15;
SELECT category_name, item_name FROM food_categories JOIN item_categories ON food_categories.category_id = item_categories.category_id JOIN food_items ON item_categories.item_id = food_items.id;
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT item_name, calories, protein FROM food_items WHERE calories > 100 AND protein > 10;
SELECT item_name, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items WHERE carbohydrates < 50 OR fat > 20;
SELECT item_name, calories, protein, carbohydrates, fat FROM food_items ORDER BY item_name DESC;

SELECT category_name, item_name, calories, protein FROM food_categories JOIN item_categories ON food_categories.category_id = item_categories.category_id JOIN food_items ON item_categories.item_id = food_items.id WHERE calories < 200 AND protein > 5;
SELECT * FROM foods WHERE calories > 100
SELECT food_name, protein, fats FROM foods ORDER BY protein DESC
SELECT food_name, carbs FROM foods WHERE fats < 5 ORDER BY carbs ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT food_name, calories FROM foods WHERE protein > 10 AND carbs < 20
SELECT food_name, category_name FROM foods JOIN food_categories ON foods.food_id = food_categories.food_id JOIN categories ON food_categories.category_id = categories.category_id
SELECT food_name, calories, protein FROM foods WHERE calories > 200 ORDER BY calories DESC
SELECT food_name, protein, carbs, fats FROM foods WHERE protein > 20 AND carbs < 50

SELECT food_name, category_name FROM foods JOIN food_categories ON foods.food_id = food_categories.food_id JOIN categories ON food_categories.category_id = categories.category_id WHERE category_name = 'Vegetables'
SELECT food_name, nutrient_name, quantity FROM foods JOIN food_nutrients ON foods.food_id = food_nutrients.food_id WHERE nutrient_name = 'Vitamin C' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_foods FROM categories JOIN food_categories ON categories.category_id = food_categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING total_foods > 5
SELECT * FROM food_items;
SELECT id, name, calories FROM food_items WHERE protein > 10;
SELECT name, calories, fats FROM food_items ORDER BY calories DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_categories WHERE category_name = 'Desserts';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS num_items FROM food_item_categories JOIN food_categories ON food_item_categories.category_id = food_categories.id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT name, calories FROM food_items WHERE protein > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, category_name FROM food_categories WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT name, protein, fats FROM food_items WHERE carbohydrates < 10 ORDER BY protein DESC, name ASC;

SELECT food_items.name, food_categories.category_name FROM food_items INNER JOIN food_item_categories ON food_items.id = food_item_categories.food_item_id INNER JOIN food_categories ON food_item_categories.category_id = food_categories.id WHERE food_categories.id = 3 ORDER BY food_items.name ASC;

SELECT f_it.name AS 'Food Name', f_it.calories AS 'Calories', f_cat.category_name AS 'Category' FROM food_items f_it JOIN food_item_categories f_cat ON f_it.id = f_cat.food_item_id JOIN food_categories f_cat ON f_cat.category_id = f_cat.id WHERE f_cat.id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY f_it.calories DESC;
